loot: A severed hand firmly gripping a note. The grip cannot be loosened.
Half-eaten apple. A rotten tooth is stuck in it.
An old painting in a fine hardwood frame (10g).
Worn leather boots with two letters burned into them.
A tied bundle of hair.
A rope.
A fluffy but dirty patchwork blanket.
A half-burned parchment.
A signet ring with some dried blood on it (50g).
A wooden barrel sealed shut with countless nails.
An old book written by a long-dead, powerful wizard.
Torn clothing (10s).
An abandoned cart with a crate on it. The cart shows signs of battle.
A lantern with a candle inside that cannot be extinguished.
A cracked wand.
A dog collar with the inscription "Norbert".
A gemstone that pulses at night.
Bones carved with various runes.
An old backpack full of gold (100g).
A pocket watch. When opened, it reveals the picture of an elderly couple.
